title: Reichenbach's Research on Odic Light and Human Magnetism
first_phrase: In the preceding text, we read about Freiherr von Reichenbach's discovery of "Od" light or phosphorescent light, emitted by certain substances, which sensitive individuals can perceive. Reichenbach's research also suggested that human beings are surrounded by a luminous smoky cloud. Some people challenged and ridiculed Reichenbach's findings, but today, similar phenomena are attributed to radioactivity. This section explores Professor Korschelts' views on using human magnetism to heal, which aligns with Reichenbach's work. Let's delve into the connection between human magnetism and healing.
